bb_turn_ignition_on.title: ESBtnBox Bindings: Toggle Ignition to ON Position
bb_turn_ignition_on.desc: Turns the key to the ON position

bb_turn_ignition_acc.title: ESBtnBox Bindings: Toggle Ignition to Acc Position
bb_turn_ignition_acc.desc: Turns the key to the Acc position

bb_turn_high_beams_on.title: ESBtnBox Bindings: Toggle High Beams On
bb_turn_high_beams_on.desc: Turns high beams on and off with the flicker of the toggle switch

bb_turn_low_beams_on.title: ESBtnBox Bindings: Toggle Low Beams On
bb_turn_low_beams_on.desc: Turns the low beams on and off with the flicker of the toggle switch

bb_turn_lightbar_light.title: ESBtnBox Bindings: Toggle Lightbar Light On
bb_turn_lightbar_light.desc: Turns the lights on the lightbar

bb_turn_lightbar_sound.title: ESBtnBox Bindings: Toggle Lightbar Sound On
bb_turn_lightbar_sound.desc: Turns the sound on the lightbar

bb_turn_high_four.title: ESBtnBox Bindings: Toggle High 4
bb_turn_high_four.desc: Set the range box to high four

bb_turn_low_four.title: ESBtnBox Bindings: Toggle Low 4
bb_turn_low_four.desc: Set the range box to low four
